public class PlacesPanel
extends BasePanel

This class defines the panel that displays the places in the GUI.

Miquel Martin

Method Detail

addSelectableElements

protected void addSelectableElements()
Add all the places to the combo box. The types are put in as is, and each place is indented with two spaces.

Specified by:
addSelectableElements in class BasePanel
